alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 12:52PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor lowland flooding occurs near Avondale * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:30 PM MDT Thursday was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.7 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM MDT.
